  • Method Details

    • getByEmail

      User getByEmail(String email)
      Retrieves a user by their email address.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address to search for (case sensitive)
      Returns:
      The User object with the specified email, or null if not found
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if email parameter is null or empty

    • getAllTechniekers

      List<User> getAllTechniekers()
      Retrieves all users with the 'Technieker' role.
      Returns:
      A list of all User objects with role 'Technieker', or an empty list if none exist
